greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = d(sigma(n)), where d(k) is the number of divisors function (A000005) and sigma(k) is the sum of divisor function (A000203).
link: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
program: (PARI) { for (n=1, 1000, write("b062068.txt", n, " ", numdiv(sigma(n))) ) } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 31 2009]
results.author: _Amarnath Murthy_, Jun 13 2001
ext: Corrected and extended by _Jason Earls_, Jun 16 2001
